## MineralsExtra_SK: A rimworld mod for the [Hardcore SK project](https://github.com/skyarkhangel/Hardcore-SK)

![](About/Preview.jpg)

This mod is an extension of [Minerals_SK](https://github.com/zachary-foster/Minerals_SK) and must come after it in the load order.
It adds additional mineral diversity.
